entry.title: Forged In Fire
entry.summary:
Author: ArtemisFAYZ012

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,921Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 0

Summary: This is the first fic I've written for 9-1-1 and these guys so I'm sorry if some things are a little OOC.Buck is the ultimate babygirl and you can't tell me otherwise. It's okay though, Eddie likes it.Eddie moved to Texas. It's fine. Totally fine. Everything's normal.Then Tommy happened. Then Maddie happened. And Buck's plans for full on denial don't work anymore.With every call, text and FaceTime, Buck falls in deeper.What he doesn't know though, is that with a little help from his sisters, Eddie figures a few things out.Who is Buck kidding? Eddie Diaz has owned him for seven years. Chris is his son. They are his life.So, what's he to do when Eddie calls and starts sounding a lot like Buck's innermost thoughts?If he's sleeping, don't wake him. If he's dying, DNR.The dream is too good.This story is in 2 parts. Part 1 is live now, rated M. Part 2 will be going up next week and will be rated E. I've never written Buddie smut before but it's coming. If that's not your jam though, stick to Part 1 as it can be read as a one-shot

entry.title: what spring does with the cherry trees
entry.summary:
Author: andtimestoodstill

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,685Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: Eddie loved his son. He loved his son so, so much. He would never stop fighting for his son. It didn‚Äôt matter if his helicopter was getting shot down in a desert halfway across the world, or if he was nearly drowning while trapped under thirty feet of mud, or if he was crawling on hands and knees back to El Paso in contrition, he was going to do whatever it took to be with Christopher. But he had also just kissed Buck for the first time ninety minutes ago, and he was supposed to have 1,440 more minutes of kissing before they had to go back to the real world. Eddie had waited seven years for this, he wanted twenty-four hours of uninterrupted necking with the love of his life, god dammit. (Or, Buck and Eddie Get Cockblocked)

entry.title: i‚Äôm not angry anymore (well, sometimes i am)
entry.summary:
Author: chimeras

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,287Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Before either of them were firefighters, Buck and Eddie met in Peru where Buck was bartending and Eddie was working construction. Then, out of nowhere, Eddie disappeared. No call, no text, no note, no explanation. So, Buck moved on.Until Eddie becomes the newest probationary firefighter at LAFD‚Äôs station 118.Situations like that are hard to forget, as well as the anger, resentment, and maybe a little self-blame. But the fiery hatred that burns under their reunion seems to set something else off ‚Äî something a little more productive‚Ä¶***title is the paramore song "Interlude: I'm Not Angry Anymore"

entry.title: Tell me all the things that I wanna hear (never wanna let you go)
entry.summary:
Author: brandspankin_new

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,636Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: ‚ÄúAre you?‚ÄùBuck‚Äôs stomach dropped. Plastering a bewildered half-smile onto his face, he turned towards Maddie.‚ÄúIn love with Eddie?‚Äù he asked, playing up the confusion in his voice. This wasn‚Äôt a conversation he had ever imagined having with his sister. Or, more accurately, a conversation he wished he never would have with Maddie, or anyone else. It was just too painful.‚ÄúIt wouldn‚Äôt be so crazy!‚Äù Maddie mused as she kept folding dish towels.Buck steeled himself for the lie. ‚ÄúExcept that I‚Äôm not!‚ÄùHe had never told anyone about his feelings, or what had happened that night the year before. There was no point. They would never be reciprocated, even if their target hadn‚Äôt moved 800 miles away.Crossing to the fridge, Buck continued. ‚ÄúAs much as everyone seems to want me to be hopelessly pining for my straight best friend, it just isn‚Äôt like that.‚ÄùorBuck and Eddie made out at Chim's bachelor party. But Buck isn't in love with his best friend. Right?

entry.title: The Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: bvddiesbro

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,474Chapters: 5/20Kudos: 314

Summary: Evan "Buck" Buckley thought he had left his past behind when he traded his Navy fatigues for turnouts. For years, he‚Äôs buried the memories‚Äîof war zones, of a lost lover, of the life he swore he'd never return to. But when a series of arson attacks target classified SCIF sites across Los Angeles, his past comes back to haunt him.NCIS are called to investigate and Buck‚Äôs carefully constructed web of lies begins to crack when Special Agent Sam Hanna arrives at Station 118‚Äîbecause Buck knows him. Sam was once his teammate, his mentor and his sudden reappearance is no coincidence.When a grainy surveillance video reveals a face Buck thought he‚Äôd never see again, the ground shifts beneath his feet. Zack, the man he mourned, the man he watched die, is alive.Working alongside NCIS and his old SEAL Team, Buck finds himself walking a dangerous tightrope. The deeper he gets, the more he risks everything‚Äîhis job, his family, his friendships and the life he‚Äôs built with Eddie and Christopher.But secrets can‚Äôt stay buried forever.

entry.title: Champagne Problems
entry.summary:
Author: ash_ptv

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,753Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Following the events of Eddie leaving for Texas and Buck's one night stand with Tommy, Buck has to face the reality of not only living in LA without Eddie but living in what was Eddie's old house. Maddie has already encouraged Buck to learn to be alone and stay away from relationships knowing how her little brother can get when he is upset and not thinking clearly. Buck seems to be taking Eddie's advice to "not make everything about him" to heart and is avoiding sharing details of his personal life and struggle with his crew. Will this be a chance for Buck to get back together with his most recent ex? Or will Buck look more into the idea that his feelings for Eddie aren't as platonic as he may think as Tommy and Maddie have suggested.Eddie is finally back with Chris and he has a lot of time while job searching to focus on how he feels now that Buck isn't 20 minutes away anymore. Is Chris really satisfied in his life with Texas now that it is not just a place he could run from his dad? Why does Chris feel like part of his family is still in California, and not the family he was running from? How will Eddie feel now that Buck seems to be talking with Tommy again?

entry.title: Fighting to Go Home
entry.summary:
Author: bandhoez9194

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,696Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 212

Summary: He got up, looking around quickly. He saw a splash of dark hair on the floor, his eyes widening. "Maddie!" He gasped, sprinting forward and kneeling beside her.He shook her shoulder, placing his fingers on her neck as he fumbled for his phone. A click sounded behind him, making him freeze."Drop the phone," a low voice said behind him, Buck turning slowly. A gun was pointed right at his forehead, hammer cocked back and the persons finger hovering over the trigger.~~~~~~~~~Only a few weeks after Eddie moves back to El Paso, Buck gets taken by a serial killer targeting family members of first responders.

entry.summary:
Author: msteen02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,887Chapters: 1/7Kudos: 8

Summary: Eddie was finally exactly where he wanted to be. He was on cloud nine after confessing his feelings for Buck, and Buck returning his confession with enthusiasm. He loved his family, and as they sat there on the couch watching a movie, Chris cuddled up on one side of him and Buck on the other, he could finally look forward to the future rather than getting hung up on the past. With Chris and Buck by his side, he couldn‚Äôt wait to explore their relationship as a family, and move on together towards the rest of their lives.OrA 5+1 story of Buck and Eddie exploring their developing relationship together, taking their time to figure out how to transition from being best friends to boyfriends, before finally breaking the news to their family at the 118.
